content: स्रुघ्नः <ab>N.</ab> of a district; पंथाः स्रुघ्नमुपतिष्ठते <ls>Sk.</ls>; it was situated at some distance-at least one day's journey-from Pātaliputra <ab>q. v.</ab>; <ab>cf.</ab> न हि देवदत्तः स्रुघ्ने संनिधीयमानस्तदहरेव पाटलिपुत्रे संनिधीयते युगपदनेकत्र वृत्तावनेकत्वप्रसंगात् <ls>Ś. B.</ls>
स्रुघ्न <ab>N.</ab> of a town and district at some distance from Pātaliputra. It is identified with the modern Sug on the old bed of the Yamunā.
